content.article_body: ISLAMABAD, Jan 20 (APP):The Senate on Monday passed five significant bills, including the Members of Parliament (Salaries and Allowances) (Amendment) Bill, 2025 and the National Assembly Secretariat Employees (Amendment) Bill, 2024, both piloted by Senator Danesh Kumar. Other bills approved by the Upper House were the Payment of Wages (Amendment) Bill, 2024, Islamabad Rent Restriction (Amendment) Bill, 2024, and the Factories (Amendment) Bill, 2024, introduced by Senator Mohsin Aziz.
